title: Type in old Portuguese typography book
content:
Hi all (again)!

In my "readings" I found an type designed by a Portuguese typography offer to the King (at the time). See picture.  
My investigations lead me to similar types. But again, I need the "pros" feedback.  
Is this already in use? I mean some typeface equal?  
I would love to digitize it, but dont want to find something equal out there.

Thanks again  
António

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023225415im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tuga_4470.jpg)
author: afonseca1974
